lines.text: Maybe in my next life, huh?
That's not a life. It's a J. Crew catalogue.

Look you don't get it do you Adrian. I showed you how things worked around here because I sympathized with you, being the outsider. But just remember this, I brought you in and if you decide to fuck with me I can just a easily throw you out.
Am I supposed to be scared now?
You're crazy! They're gonna see it on you out there. They're gonna see it all over you. And they'll send you back. You'll see!
You're so lame right now, you'd screw up a wet dream.
Wow guys... I think you met your match.
Did we just get dissed by the cabana girl?
You know Doc, we still never had that talk about this whole knocking a little ball into a hole obsession of yours.
What are we gonna do? We don't have any proof. We don't have any cards left to play.
What do you do if you want to stay in the game, and you've got nothing in your hand?
